name: Hoppy Frog 2
description:
Title: Hoppy Frog 2

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Hoppy Frog 2 is about a frog that has trained in the ninja arts to get revenge on the evil overlord that put his brother in an endless trap of suffering. However, the frog does not realize that he himself has been trapped in an endless loop of running forever with relaxing yet slightly annoying music playing into his ears for eternity.

Instructions: Press SPACE to start the game, press UP to jump, press ENTER/RETURN to restart.

Game Design Team: Alex Homeyer – Game Designer
